      • useGLPoints

        public void useGLPoints(boolean value)
        An opitmization for particles that uses GL_POINTS instead of a textured quad for rendering. This improves the performance of the particles emitted, but they will draw a colored GL_POINT instead of an image.
        Parameters:
        value -

      • useRelativePositioning

        public void useRelativePositioning(boolean value)
        A mode for particles that ensure that they will always keep the same position relative to the emitter, if the emitter moves while particles are being emitted.
        Parameters:
        value -
